ai-kp2:1.1_0: I undertake the precept to refrain from killing living creatures.
ai-kp2:2.1_0: I undertake the precept to refrain from stealing.
ai-kp2:3.1_0: I undertake the precept to refrain from sexual activity.
ai-kp2:4.1_0: I undertake the precept to refrain from lying.
ai-kp2:5.1_0: I undertake the precept to refrain from taking alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.
ai-kp2:6.1_0: I undertake the precept to refrain from food at the wrong time.
ai-kp2:7.1_0: I undertake the precept to refrain from dancing, singing, music, and seeing shows.
ai-kp2:8.1_0: I undertake the precept to refrain from beautifying and adorning myself with garlands, perfumes, and makeup.
ai-kp2:9.1_0: I undertake the precept to refrain from high and luxurious beds.
ai-kp2:10.1_0: I undertake the precept to refrain from receiving gold and money.
